channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational DOORS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational DOORS

item.title: CVE-2017-1532|2024-08-05T13:32:29.935Z -- ibm -- rational%20doors
item.description: IBM DOORS 9.5 and 9.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 130411.

item.title: CVE-2017-1545|2024-08-05T13:32:30.275Z -- ibm -- rational%20doors
item.description: IBM Doors Web Access 9.5 and 9.6 could allow an attacker with physical access to the system to log into the application using previously stored credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 130914.

item.title: CVE-2017-1540|2024-08-05T13:32:29.645Z -- ibm -- rational%20doors
item.description: IBM Doors Web Access 9.5 and 9.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 130808.

item.title: CVE-2018-1457|2024-08-05T03:59:39.070Z -- ibm -- rational%20doors
item.description: An undisclosed vulnerability in IBM Rational DOORS 9.5.1 through 9.6.1.10 application allows an attacker to gain DOORS administrator privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 140208.

item.title: CVE-2017-1516|2024-08-05T13:32:29.949Z -- ibm -- rational%20doors
item.description: IBM Doors Web Access 9.5 and 9.6 could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 129826.

item.title: CVE-2017-1515|2024-08-05T13:32:29.933Z -- ibm -- rational%20doors
item.description: IBM Doors Web Access 9.5 and 9.6 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from HTTP internal server error responses. IBM X-Force ID: 129825.

item.title: CVE-2017-1567|2024-08-05T13:39:31.863Z -- ibm -- rational%20doors
item.description: IBM Doors Web Access 9.5 and 9.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 131769.

item.description: IBM Doors Web Access 9.5 and 9.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 131763.
